item.name: Window Resizing
item.appendix: To be used with Better Touch Tool or other resizing application

item.name: Window Sizing Mode (K Centered)
item.appendix: The "window sizing mode" allows you to resizing the current window to
a predefined size and location (you must configure the shortcuts to match).
U I O → TL (Shift+Opt+Ctrl+←) TOP (Cmd+Opt+Ctrl+↑) TR (Shift+Opt+Ctrl+↑)
J K L → LEFT (Cmd+Opt+Ctrl+←) CTR (Cmd+Opt+Ctrl+C) RIGHT (Cmd+Opt+Ctrl+→)
DELETE → MINIMIZE (Cmd+M) Note: Default shortcut, no setup needed
Hold W+E to activate "window resizing mode", then press one of the above keys
